attributes.additional_details: It will help mental health in the workplace
attributes.background: I have seen so many friends lose their pets who have been apart of their lives for years. For employers to disregard this is not fair. For a lot of people, pets are part of the family! They should all be given the opportunity to grieve.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639550

You could start a new petition when the above petition closes.
